text: cea xya pi rwm yun lahmad nı masyid nan penxankhad nænxn masyid thi thuk wang rakthan bn khwam yakerng tangtæ wan ræk nan smkhwr xyang ying thi cea ca kheapi yun lahmad nı nan pheraa nı masyid nan mi khna bukhkhl thi chxb ca chara taw hı brisuththi læa xallxhˌ nan thrng rak brrda phu thi chara taw hı saxad brisuththi xyu semx
